-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recently has been released an Indiana Jones boxset which included the 3 main 
movies, but ommited the 2 hour documentary which was on the fourth disc of the 
first boxset.

This release includes this documental, ripped from the Spanish dvd, in its 
original English audio with subtitles, ripped for english and spanish, and in a 
subpack for the rest of languages, that is: english, spanish, croatian, greek, 
hebrew, portuguese, serbian and slovenian, which you can rip easily using 
SubRip.

Take notice that the source had a funny configuration, as it was PAL but at 
the same time, it was interlaced (strange combination), hence you might notice 
some strange issues at some moments.  Well, that&#039;s been the best possible 
result.

As a bonus, I&#039;ve also included an english documentary of about 10 minutes, which 
was only available on a fifth disc, exclusive to Best Buy stores, when the 
trilogy was originally released.  No subs for that, sorry.
